text: Adriano Zecca (April 11, 1923 - March 1983) was an Italian professional football player and coach. He was born in Genoa and played for 4 seasons (100 games, 19 goals) in the Serie A for Modena F.C. and A.S. Roma. ==Honours== * Italian Champion: 1945/46 (not officially considered a Serie A season). ==External links== Category:1923 births Category:1983 deaths Category:Italian footballers Category:Serie A players Category:A.C.
